issues.title: KEK access failure causes entire test class to be skipped
issues.problem: When SDF_GetKEKAccessRight throws SDR_NOTSUPPORT, Assume.assumeTrue(false) is called inside setUp() at line 96. This causes ALL tests in the class to be skipped, including tests that don't depend on KEK (e.g., external-key tests like testExternalKeyEncrypt). This significantly reduces test coverage and hides potential failures in other test methods.

issues.title: Unsupported private key access right API skips entire internal sign/verify test
issues.problem: When SDF_GetPrivateKeyAccessRight throws SDR_NOTSUPPORT, the entire test is skipped. However, some devices don't require explicit access-right calls but still support internal signing. Skipping the test prevents verification of the working SDF_InternalSign_ECC/SDF_InternalVerify_ECC functionality.

issues.title: Optional encryption validation converts successful key generation test to skipped
issues.problem: In testGenerateKeyWithIPK_ECC, after key generation assertions already passed, if symmetric encrypt/decrypt is unsupported (SDR_NOTSUPPORT), the test is marked as skipped. This hides the successful verification of SDF_GenerateKeyWithIPK_ECC and weakens regression detection.

issues.title: Resource leak in exception handling test
issues.problem: In testExceptionHandling, if SDF_OpenSession throws an SDFException, the catch block only catches RuntimeException. The SDFException will propagate up without closing deviceHandle, causing a resource leak.

issues.title: assertNotNull used on primitive-returning getters creates no-op assertions
issues.problem: getDeviceVersion(), getStandardVersion(), and getBufferSize() return primitive long. When auto-boxed to Long, the value can never be null, making these assertions ineffective.

issues.title: Inconsistent Assume.assumeTrue message format with unnecessary prefix
issues.problem: The Assume.assumeTrue message "[跳过] KEK 权限获取功能不支持" includes the [跳过] prefix which is inconsistent with the pattern used in other similar calls and doesn't properly describe the condition being assumed.

issues.title: Inconsistent Assume.assumeTrue message with extraneous text
issues.problem: The Assume.assumeTrue message "获取私钥权限不支持，继续测试..." has inconsistent formatting with "..." which doesn't follow the pattern of other similar calls.

issues.title: Inconsistent Assume.assumeTrue message with leading spaces
issues.problem: The Assume.assumeTrue message has leading spaces which is inconsistent with other similar calls.

issues.title: Inconsistent Assume.assumeTrue message with leading spaces
issues.problem: The Assume.assumeTrue message has leading spaces.

issues.title: Inconsistent Assume.assumeTrue message with extraneous text
issues.problem: The Assume.assumeTrue message "获取私钥权限不需要或不支持，继续测试..." is inconsistent with Chinese text mixed with "...".

issues.title: Inconsistent Assume.assumeTrue message with leading spaces
issues.problem: The Assume.assumeTrue message has leading spaces.

issues.title: Inconsistent Assume.assumeTrue message with extraneous text
issues.problem: The Assume.assumeTrue message "获取私钥权限不需要或不支持，继续测试..." has Chinese text mixed with "...".

issues.title: Inconsistent Assume.assumeTrue message format
issues.problem: The Assume.assumeTrue message format doesn't follow the consistent pattern - it has Chinese mixed with "...".
